abstract: Excerpts from the Memory Grid Community Collection 2002-2003
description: Short excerpts from some of the foundation works in the Memory Grid Community collection grouped into the themes of Activist Stories, Community Development Stories, Stories in Close Up, Stories from the Archives, Gender Stories, Community Arts Stories and Indigenous Stories.(see documentation)
